message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. What do you think?
That's a bit higher than I was hoping for.  While I'm interested in the product, I can't go higher than $12000.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $14000 is still a bit too high for me. How about $13000? I'm really interested in the product, but that's the most I can afford right now.
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is my final offer in this range
I'm still not quite there. While I understand this is your final offer in this range,  I'm really pushing my budget here.  Could you consider $13000?  I'm ready to close the deal at that price.

I've already told you that I won't go below $13500, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $13200. This is my last offer, Bob. If you don't take it, I'll have to consider other options
